name: repka-arts-theme
description: Repka Arts Contemporary Art Gallery - Shopify Theme

scripts.sync:dev:pull: shopify theme pull --theme=193033601288 && git add . && git commit -m 'Sync from Dev Theme' || echo 'No changes to commit'
scripts.sync:live:pull: shopify theme pull --theme=193003913480 && git add . && git commit -m 'Sync from Live Theme' || echo 'No changes to commit'
scripts.deploy:dev: git push origin dev && shopify theme push --theme=193033601288
scripts.deploy:live: git push origin main && shopify theme push --theme=193003913480 --allow-live
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run push:live
scripts.sync: npm run pull && git add . && git commit -m 'Sync from Shopify' && git push

author: Repka Arts
